      permission - New user's role

    • updateProduct

      public Product updateProduct(Integer productID, String name, String category, Double price, String weather, String url)
      Updates a current product in the database
      Parameters:
      productID - product_id from the database
      name - Optional new name to assign to the product in the database
      category - Optional new category to assign to the product in the database
      price - Optional new price to assign to the product in the database
      weather - Optional new weather match to assign to the product in the database
      url - Optional new image URL to assign to the product in the database
      Returns:
      JSON object containing the product's updated body

    • addProduct

      public Product addProduct(String name, String category, Double price, String weather)
      Adds a new product to the database
      Parameters:
      name - Name to assign to the new product
      category - Category to assign to the new product
      price - Price to assign to the new product
      weather - Optional weather match to assign to the new product
      Returns:
      JSON Object with new / reactivated product body

      Parameters:
      inventoryId - Inventory ID for item in the database
      newName - Name to assign to inventory item
      quantity - Stock quantity for item
      isTopping - Check to see if inventory item is a topping

    • excessStock

      public List<Map<String,Object>> excessStock(LocalDate date)
      Shows which inventory items have sold less than 10% of their inventory given a start date
      Parameters:
      date - Date that denotes start of inventory usage counting
      Returns:
      JSON Object with inventory items that sold less than 10% of their stock
